attributes.action: create league tables for Members of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call for the introduction of league tables for MP's in order to raise standards in politics and make them more responsive to their constituents' needs.
Performance criteria should take into account the number of office hours and constituent matters attended to by an MP  each day as well as how long it takes for cases to be responded to and the rate of success. Criteria should also include number of days in attendance in Parliament, number of votes and number of times participated in debates.
